td.p: Chromebooks will no longer be repaired, nor will loaners be supplied - due to social distancing required for both staff and you!
Keep them safe! Take care of them!
Do not take them to bed with you! Leave them on a table/desk to charge overnight.
Handle with both hands! Keep food/drink away from them!

span.span: Lunch Update! YOU MUST SIGN UP FOR LUNCH

p.span: THANK YOU TO THE MANY VOLUNTEERS HELPING MAKE THIS HAPPEN!

td.p: Here is an update on our lunch distribution! Monongalia County Schools will continue providing lunches and breakfast with help from many volunteers! Monongalia County Schools will be providing 5 lunches and 5 breakfast meals on Thursdays. Delivery time is noon and areas are limited and a list can be found on our website. -------->see------->
Remember that this is ONLY for Monongalia County students up to the age of 18.

This is a fantastic partnership with numerous volunteers and Bartini Prime. A lot of hard work has taken place with our director of Child Nutrition making sure the food has been ordered and gets to the location where it will be packaged and prepped for delivery on Thursday. Please help us thank the board members, the office of child nutrition and the many volunteers who are helping us continue serving our students.
Check Social Media for Updates.
